item.title: LoRACLR: Contrastive Adaptation for Customization of Diffusion Models
item.description: LoRACLR merges multiple LoRA models for high-fidelity multi-concept image generation, using a contrastive objective to ensure concept distinctiveness and prevent interference.

item.title: Do I Know This Entity? Knowledge Awareness and Hallucinations in Language Models
item.description: LLMs’ hallucinations stem from entity recognition: SAEs reveal model ‘self-knowledge’, causally affecting whether it hallucinates or refuses to answer. This mechanism is even repurposed by chat finet…
